tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (QP (DT Half)) (NN hour)) (ADVP (RB away) (PP (IN from) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN love)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (NN life)) (CC and) (NP (PRP I)))))))) (VP (VBP come) (S (VP (VBG bearing) (NP (DT a) (NN treat) (NN :--RRB-)))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [come/VBP nsubj>[hour/NN nummod>Half/DT nmod:away_from>[love/NN case>[away/RB mwe>from/IN] det>the/DT nmod:of>[life/NN case>of/IN nmod:poss>my/PRP$ cc>and/CC conj:and>I/PRP] nmod:of>I/PRP]] xcomp>[bearing/VBG dobj>[:--RRB-/NN det>a/DT compound>treat/NN]]]
